data: Check your understanding of how to give examples in a group discussion.

first_message: Hey there! Now I will give you 10 sentences to translate into English.This activity is just for my understanding on how well you know this concept so don't worry about making any mistakes. Can we start?
below are array of question objects to be put inside key staged_questions.default.questions

prompt_id: 7deb4075-c026-43fe-906c-5439d404bd9c
question: For example, Meesho grew because small sellers use social media.
SYSTEM_TRANSLATION_RULES:""
grammar_concept: Group Discussion - Giving Examples
---
prompt_id: 7deb4075-c026-43fe-906c-5439d404bd9c
question: For example, Google allows flexible work because it trusts employees.
SYSTEM_TRANSLATION_RULES:""

question: For example, Khan Academy helps because lessons are free and simple.
